tag_list: entrepreneur, web, cto, marketing, author, forbes
overview:
Serial entrepreneur and business author.

An Austin, Texas-based entrepreneur, Kevin has built or participated in over 30 start-ups since the early 1990’s, with 3 successful exits as of 2012. He is currently running the Austin office of Classified Ventures, whose current projects include http://www.ApartmentHomeLiving.com (a top 10 real estate site in the US), and http://www.Auto.com.

In 2012, business publisher Apress released Kevin’s book “Startup: An Insider’s Guide to Launching and Running a Business”. He also writes for Forbes on the subject of business and startup companies.

He is an advisor for numerous start-up companies both in the United States and internationally.
